visualize correlation among samples

Source: R/tidyMS_plotting.R
plot_sample_correlation.Rd

visualize correlation among samples

plot_sample_correlation(pdata, config)

Arguments

pdata

data.frame
config

AnalysisConfiguration

See also

Other plotting: Contrasts_Plotter, INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, medpolishPlydf(), missigness_histogram(), missingness_per_condition_cumsum(), missingness_per_condition(), plot_NA_heatmap(), plot_aggregation(), plot_heatmap_cor(), plot_heatmap(), plot_hierarchies_add_quantline(), plot_hierarchies_boxplot_df(), plot_hierarchies_line_df(), plot_hierarchies_line(), plot_intensity_distribution_violin(), plot_pca(), plot_raster()

Examples


istar <- prolfqua::data_ionstar$filtered()
#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
stopifnot(nrow(istar$data) == 25780)
config <- istar$config$clone(deep=TRUE)
analysis <- istar$data

analysis <- remove_small_intensities(analysis, config)
analysis <- transform_work_intensity(analysis, config, log2)
#> Column added : log2_peptide.intensity
mm <- toWideConfig(analysis, config, as.matrix = TRUE)
class(plot_sample_correlation(analysis, config))

#> [1] "matrix" "array"
